description:
By upgrading the LEDs and adding their new lightweight strap to the HM65R, Fenix has made a great light even better. This versatile headlamp gives you both flood and spotlighting with independently controlled LEDs. The 3 spotlight modes and 3 floodlight modes can be used on their own or together. Read in the tent, work on a job or ride a couple laps with darkness-melting 1700 lumens. The internal battery is easily charged via an integrated USB-C port, or use the lithium 123A batteries when you're away from USB ports.

  • Wider headband now uses a ratcheting dial to find that perfect fit. The increased width disperses the headlamp’s weight comfortably, and combined with the ratcheting closure, keeps your beam steadier when on the run
  • Cast from lightweight magnesium, the body is lighter and has improved cooling over aluminum
  • 6 modes, 3 in spotlight: high (4h at 1300 lumens), medium (12h at 400 lumens), low (24h at 55 lumens), 3 in floodlight: high (12h at 400 lumens), medium (33h at 70 lumens and low (300h at 5 lumens)
  • 2 lenses and modes: 1 for spot and 1 for flood, each can be used independently or together
  • Powered by 18650 rechargeable battery or 2 CR123A batteries
  • Integrated USB-C port charges internal 18650 battery fast
  • 4-level power indicator
  • 2-sided switch controls independent or combined modes
  • Lockout mode prevents light from being switched on inside your pack
  • Ratcheting tilt housing tilts up to 60°
  • Light housing has an integrated partial button cover, protecting the silicone buttons
  • Perforated, reflective headband wicks away sweat and helps keep you seen
  • IPX6 waterproofing means your light is ready for any weather
  • In the box: HM65R-T, head strap, 18650 ARB-L18-3500 3500mAh battery, spare battery compartment O-ring, USB-C cable, manual and warranty card
name: Fenix HM65R-T Rechargeable Headlamp
